con:property.con:name: body
con:property.con:value: hotel is okay with facilities but the service is great! drivers and guides are very accomodating on our needs and are willing to make changes if needed to meet our needs. travel agent contact in thailand is hard to contact. i called 4x during the trip and not once did they pick up the phone. although the whole trip went with not much hassle. the travel agency itself is good and modified our tour just how we like it
